channel.title: RSPS Login Message?
channel.description: I believe this is mostly client sided, But anyhow, How could I make this interface pop up when logging in? And how to edit it etc. [img]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w426/IMakeTheLedgeEnd/LoginMessage.jpg[/img]

item.title: RSPS Login Message?
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:20, topic:444761”]Packet id 126.

[tt]sendString(“text”, StringOnInterfaceID);[/tt][/quote]

Seems simple enough, Thank you

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Login Message?
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

This is a 317, But is there anyway to add interface 15244 to pop up saying things such as these:

[code] sendWindowPane(549, 0);
sendInterface(1, 549, 2, 378);
sendInterface(1, 549, 3, 447);
sendString(“Welcome to Your Server”, 378, 113);
sendString(“You are connected from: “+player.getSession().getRemoteAddress(), 378, 114);
sendString(“0”, 378, 39);
sendString(””+player.votes+"", 378, 96);
sendString(“Founders: <img=1>”, 378, 37);
sendString(player.getDisplayName()+", You can use the forums or website to contact us. We only repeat on mails we never send new mails!", 378, 38);
sendString(“You have “+player.votes+” vote points.”, 378, 94);
sendString(“Please vote at votefor100m.tk and recive 5 vote points.”, 378, 56);
if(player.donator == 0) {
sendString(“You can be a donator for already 5$, and you help us also to keep the server alive.”, 378, 93);
}
if(player.donator == 1) {
sendString(“Thank you for donating to the server “+player.getDisplayName()+”, we hope you donate later again!”, 378, 93);
}
if(player.GotBankPIN == false) {
sendString(“You do not have a bank pin. Please visit a bank if you would like one.”, 378, 62);
}
if(player.GotBankPIN == true) {
sendString(“You registered a bank pin. People cannot come in your bank now.”, 378, 62);
}
}

    public void sendInterface(int id) {
            sendCloseInterface();
            sendInterface(0, player.isFullScreen() ? 746 : 548, player.isFullScreen() ? 8 : 16, id);
    }[/code]

But for a 317?

This is the interface 15244:

1-3.jpg757×494

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Login Message?
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

[quote=“dragonix1415, post:10, topic:444761”]If this is a 562 your trying to get the log in screen for, just add this to ActionSender.java
I’m not sure on the client side part sorry.

[code]
sendWindowPane(549, 0);
sendInterface(1, 549, 2, 378);
sendInterface(1, 549, 3, 447);
sendString(“Welcome to Your Server”, 378, 113);
sendString(“You are connected from: “+player.getSession().getRemoteAddress(), 378, 114);
sendString(“0”, 378, 39);
sendString(””+player.votes+"", 378, 96);
sendString(“Founders: <img=1>”, 378, 37);
sendString(player.getDisplayName()+", You can use the forums or website to contact us. We only repeat on mails we never send new mails!", 378, 38);
sendString(“You have “+player.votes+” vote points.”, 378, 94);
sendString(“Please vote at votefor100m.tk and recive 5 vote points.”, 378, 56);
if(player.donator == 0) {
sendString(“You can be a donator for already 5$, and you help us also to keep the server alive.”, 378, 93);
}
if(player.donator == 1) {
sendString(“Thank you for donating to the server “+player.getDisplayName()+”, we hope you donate later again!”, 378, 93);
}
if(player.GotBankPIN == false) {
sendString(“You do not have a bank pin. Please visit a bank if you would like one.”, 378, 62);
}
if(player.GotBankPIN == true) {
sendString(“You registered a bank pin. People cannot come in your bank now.”, 378, 62);
}
}

public void sendInterface(int id) {
	sendCloseInterface();
	sendInterface(0, player.isFullScreen() ? 746 : 548, player.isFullScreen() ? 8 : 16, id);
}[/code][/quote]

he’s not using a 562

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Login Message?
item.dc:creator: @dragonix1415 dragonix1415
item.description:
@dragonix1415 wrote:

If this is a 562 your trying to get the log in screen for, just add this to ActionSender.java
I’m not sure on the client side part sorry.

[code]
sendWindowPane(549, 0);
sendInterface(1, 549, 2, 378);
sendInterface(1, 549, 3, 447);
sendString(“Welcome to Your Server”, 378, 113);
sendString(“You are connected from: “+player.getSession().getRemoteAddress(), 378, 114);
sendString(“0”, 378, 39);
sendString(””+player.votes+"", 378, 96);
sendString(“Founders: <img=1>”, 378, 37);
sendString(player.getDisplayName()+", You can use the forums or website to contact us. We only repeat on mails we never send new mails!", 378, 38);
sendString(“You have “+player.votes+” vote points.”, 378, 94);
sendString(“Please vote at votefor100m.tk and recive 5 vote points.”, 378, 56);
if(player.donator == 0) {
sendString(“You can be a donator for already 5$, and you help us also to keep the server alive.”, 378, 93);
}
if(player.donator == 1) {
sendString(“Thank you for donating to the server “+player.getDisplayName()+”, we hope you donate later again!”, 378, 93);
}
if(player.GotBankPIN == false) {
sendString(“You do not have a bank pin. Please visit a bank if you would like one.”, 378, 62);
}
if(player.GotBankPIN == true) {
sendString(“You registered a bank pin. People cannot come in your bank now.”, 378, 62);
}
}

public void sendInterface(int id) {
	sendCloseInterface();
	sendInterface(0, player.isFullScreen() ? 746 : 548, player.isFullScreen() ? 8 : 16, id);
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Login Message?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

well in a 317 to send an interface, it’s packet 97, but your pic doesn’t look like a 317. but in your login method, whatever it may be called, simply send packet 97 with whatever interface id you’re trying to send
